title: Colnago peddles the blockchain with Special Edition C64 NFT 1-of-1 digital bike
content:
Zwift. Bitcoin. Dogecoin. Is anything real any more? We live in a confusing time where digital assets are becoming interchangeable with physical cash, which brings us to the NFT. That’s non-fungible token for those not up on their Nyan Cat news (which just sold for $590,000). What is an NFT? It’s basically a completely unique […]

The post Colnago peddles the blockchain with Special Edition C64 NFT 1-of-1 digital bike appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
